US, Chinese finance officials open meetings in BeijingU.S. Treasury and Chinese Finance Ministry officials started a two-day meeting in Beijing on Thursday to discuss financial stability and capital markets issues between the two economic powers, deepening an engagement revived last year. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:21:33 GMT Z22ZWSABUBNF5EK2YXWFBJT77A https://www.reuters.com/business/us-chinese-finance-officials-open-meetings-beijing-2024-01-18/Reuters商业
Li Haotong in four-way lead after first round of Dubai Desert ClassicFormer winner Li Haotong carded a five-under-par 67 in the first round for a four-way share of the lead in the Dubai Desert Classic at the Emirates Golf Club on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:45:44 GMT NGMU57UQVVKRLCAQDZYZS2TR4Q https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/li-haotong-four-way-lead-after-first-round-dubai-desert-classic-2024-01-18/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
Brazil's Lula to meet Chinese foreign minister on FridayBrazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will meet with China's visiting Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday afternoon in the northeastern Brazilian city of Fortaleza, a presidential spokesperson said on Thursday. India's NMDC says it has no plans to export iron ore to ChinaIndia's NMDC Ltd , the country's largest state-owned iron ore miner, on Thursday said it has no plans to sell iron ore to China and it is scaling up production to meet domestic demand. Exclusive: Saudi Arabia still considering BRICS membership, sources saySaudi Arabia is still considering an invitation to become a member of the BRICS bloc of countries after being asked to join by the grouping last year, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Thursday. China's embrace of GMO crops gains momentum with new import, planting approvalsChina on Thursday approved additional varieties of genetically modified soybeans and corn for import and production while expanding their planting areas nationwide, as part of a drive to improve food security and reduce imports. LME CEO aims to have first contracts with Shanghai futures exchange in 2024The London Metal Exchange (LME) aims to have pilot contracts using prices from the Shanghai Futures Exchange (ShFE) this year, its chief executive told Reuters on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting. Exclusive: India could ease China investment curbs if border stays calmIndia could ease its heightened scrutiny of Chinese investments if the two countries' border remains peaceful, a senior Indian official said in the first signal that the four-year-old curbs could be lifted.
